item.description:
One of our newest members offers us a chance to try something new...thank you Robin!!!!
Sounds like a nice idea.

Thursday, September 6th
8pm
Cost: $5
robin@yogawithrobin.com
http://www.yogawithro...

Let?s gather at 8pm for introductions and a brief tour of the Center. Class will begin at 8:15pm and end promptly at 9:15pm. ?Wear comfortable clothing that you can move well in.?
Afterwards, we can gather for drinks and/or appetizers at the 99 or another local restaurant.

Robin has been doing yoga since 1968 and is an experienced, Certified Yoga Instructor who prides herself on helping you to make the postures work for you instead of you working for the postures.
No Prior experience with Yoga is Necessary!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Singles Yoga
